title: Resident.Evil.Revelations.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Resident.Evil.Revelations.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

INFORMATION 

Year: 2013 
Genre: Action , Survival Horror, 3rd Person, 3D 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language: RUS | ENG 
Voice set Language: ENG 
Tablet: ALI213 

System requirements

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7, Windows 8 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 processor with a clock frequency of 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GTS/ATI Radeon HD 3850 or better DirectX 9.0c compatible 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0 
Free space on hard disk: 7.5 GB 


Resident Evil  Revelations revised again on the PC platform with 
high-quality images of high resolution, improved lighting effects 
and impressive sound picture. This latest version of Resident 
Evil Revelations also contains additional materials, including 
fearsome new enemies, an additional level of complexity, integration 
and improvement ResidentEvil.net mode "Raid". Mode "Raid", first 
presented in a series in the original version Resident Evil Revelations, 
allows players to play online in cooperative mode or alone in single 
player mode, perform a variety of tasks and win the hordes of enemies, 
and raise the level of the characters better weapons. New weapons, 
new skill sets and new game characters, including Hank (Hunk), 
open new depth regime "Raid".

Features repack:

Do not cut / recoded 
Version of the game - the last on 01/03/2014 

Additions: 

Resistance Set 
Enhancement Set 
LADY HUNK 
Rachael Ooze 
Parker's Government + Custom Part: "FBC" 
Jessica's G18 + Custom Part: "BSAA" 
Jill's Samurai Edge + Custom Part: "STARS"
